phrases: You are the bad person who tricks girls who dream of becoming Cinderella
with a pair of fake glass shoes!
In the name of the moon, Sailor Moon will punish you!
I am sorry I am not straightforward, I can say it in my dreams
My thoughts are about to short circuit, I want to see you right now
Moonlight that makes me want to cry, midnight that keeps me from calling
Because I am so innocent, what should I do?
Guided by the light of the moon
We will meet again and again
I count the sparkle of constellations to foretell the future of my love
We were born in the same land, miracle romance
I believe in it, miracle romance
I am Usagi Tsukino, 14 years old.
I am clumsier than others and a bit of a crybaby.
One day, a strange black cat, Luna, appeared
and gave me a peculiar transforming brooch and made me a sailor warrior.
But, she wants me to fight against bad guys.
Oh well, I guess everything will be okay.
The Road to Stardom is Tough
If I am like this even before I get to school,
I will be so tired that I will not be able to study.
Mikan's Recommendation For Anyone Tired Genkirin Kekkou Medicines
Mikan's Recommendation For Anyone Tired Mikan's Recommendation For Anyone Tired.
Maybe I will buy one, since Mikan is recommending it.
You made it on time because I smacked you.
I finally got a poster of Mikan!
Umino, did you steal this poster from the drugstore?
No, I got this through a certain internet store!
I have several left over, so I will sell it to you at a cheap price.
No, thanks, I do not want one.
As you know, Mikan Shiratori is from our Juban Municipal Junior High.
She is 17 years old and already in eight commercials.
Mikan Shiratori... 17 years old CM Works Done... 8 commercials
She is 17 years old and already in eight commercials.
Mikan Shiratori... 17 years old CM Works Done... 8 commercials
Mikan Shiratori... 17 years old CM Works Done... 8 commercials Monthly Salary... 2,000,000 yen
I wonder how many shortcakes I could buy with that kind of money?
Was not she scouted when she was walking in town?
If I were lucky like her, I could do the same thing!
I cannot believe those scouts never spotted us.
They just do not know a good thing when they see it.
To put it bluntly, the scouts do know when they see a good thing,
and that is why you girls were ignored.
Frankly speaking, at our Juban Municipal Junior High,
the next star to follow in Mikan Shiratori's footsteps is...
New Spring Show on Channel 9 Rock, Paper, Scissors with Mikan!
New Spring Show on Channel 9 Rock, Paper, Scissors with Mikan!
New Spring Show on Channel 9 Rock, Paper, Scissors with Mikan!
We will storm the entertainment world!
I meant that we would try to sell our songs!
And we will become bigger stars than even Mikan!
Let us do it, let us do it!
She should know that we do not have time for that.
Together, we have nothing to be afraid of!
Then, let us go for it!
I am sorry I am not straightforward,
I can say it in my dreams.
My thoughts are about to short circuit,
I want to see you right now.
When do you mean, killing the cat?!
We are going to be future stars!
Guided by the light of the moon,
Guided by the light of the moon,
Guided by the light of the moon,
we will meet again and again.
Oh, Usagi, you are so clumsy!
Oh, Usagi, you are so clumsy!
I count the sparkle of constellations...
I count the sparkle of constellations...
You are so quick to blame me!
All right, then let us both go our separate ways to become Cinderella!
But in that case, we will be rivals from this moment on!
I said all that, but I do not know what to do.
Hey, Luna, how about trying something like that, too?
Dad, thanks for the great idea!
Pretty soon, we will have entertainment reporters
Does she have a fever or something?
That is nothing, compared to how she usually acts.
Now, Have you learned your lesson?
Why do I have to do something like this?
Gurio Umino has come to see Naru after receiving an invitation by phone!
Well, in your case, I could not expect more out of you, Umino.
Excuse me, but why do I have to dress up like this?
Now, now, Umino, you need to learn about real life, too!
that you would be even more attractive if you knew a little more about real life.
The beauty and the beast combo.
This just might attract a lot of attention.
I feel as though my whole life has changed, Naru!
You, too, and even you could follow in Mikan Shiratori's footsteps!
Everyone can be Cinderella, starting today!
We are looking for stars like me!
Everyone, make sure to apply to our Cinderella Caravan!
Hey, did you hear about the Cinderella Caravan?
I have got a lot of things going on, okay?!
They are looking for the next Mikan Shiratori through the Caravan!
Since even Mikan is assisting in the search,
this is a pretty sure way to stardom!
I am the one who is going to win!
You do not need to do that right now!
Everyone, what do you want to be?
You guys, why are not you in school?
Mikan, what are you doing, canceling your appointments?!
You cannot just go off and do things on your own!
You, too, can be a star, starting from today!
I can walk on my hands!
Today is the day we will show them what we have been working on!
I figured maybe you needed a little break, so I put up with it, but...
But this is not just a little break, you are serious about becoming a star.
Then, do not apply for the Cinderella Caravan!
Now's not the time to be goofing off!
So, you will quit, will not you?
Seriously, we do not have time for this!
Luna just does not understand a young girl's genuine dream!
I just had to bump into the guy I did not want to see.
I can see your dumpling head.
Do not tell me you are going to that Cinderella Caravan.
would have to compete with a comedy routine.
Of course, I am not going!
Darn it, he is such a busybody!
Yesterday, I went to buy two loaves of bread (pan)!
Then, they suddenly gave me strawberry-patterned panties (pantsu)!
Two loaves of bread is pan-two (panties)!
People who passed will be in a show,
which will be held at Shan Shan Plaza next Sunday!
From that moment on, all of you will be stars!
Is that about how things work?
What do you get if you take away a vulture's (hagetaka) feathers (ge/ke)?
Okay, does everyone have a roll of tape?
Everyone, I am going to be holding an autograph session now!
Everyone, class is going to start!
Getting into the entertainment business is not easy!
We do not have time for class!
We do not have time for class!
You should not damage a star's precious face!

I can say it in my dreams.
Do not you think they are acting a little weird?

Everyone around here is acting like them.

I want to see you right now.
They all think they have become stars I want to see you right now.
And they have stopped studying and working.
I want to see you right now.
And they have stopped studying and working.
Moonlight that makes me want to cry,
I wonder if this is the doing of another monster?
Moonlight that makes me want to cry,
I wonder if this is the doing of another monster?
Midnight that keeps me from calling.
They are all people who participated in the Cinderella Caravan.
Midnight that keeps me from calling.
They are all people who participated in the Cinderella Caravan.
Then, I almost became one of them, too.
Because I am so innocent, what should I do?
Yup, so you should thank me.
Because I am so innocent, what should I do?
Yup, so you should thank me.
But you could say that you got in the way of my becoming a star.
But you could say that you got in the way of my becoming a star.
I cannot believe you are still saying that.
Please come to Shan Shan Plaza on Sunday.
That is where our concert's going to be!
We are the one's who are putting a show on at Shan Shan Plaza!!
No, it will be our live show!
Everyone seems to think they are the star.
You, too, can be a star.
You, too, can be a star.
There are not any customers lined up.
There are not any customers lined up.
All right, everyone is show is going to start now!
You can hear them, cannot you?
Let us do our best, Yumiko!

I am going to start taking your energy now.
Soon, I will be able to offer fresh energy to our great ruler.

I am sorry I am not straightforward, I can say it in my dreams.

My thoughts are about to short circuit...

You saw me, did not you?

Do I have to go there again?
Naru and everybody else are in danger!

You are the bad person who tricks girls who dream of becoming Cinderella
with a pair of fake glass shoes!
I am the sailor warrior of love and justice,
In the name of the moon, I will punish you!
You are not Mikan, are you?!
Oh, she is never around when I need her!
Sailor Moon, you are the star of the show!
Kuri, when d'you start talkin' in the Kansai dialect?
Nothing good ever happens if you are always goofing off.
In my dream, you and I were together
When we were friends, it did not bother us
And we casually talked to each other
But there was a moment when I noticed only you
